scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.move:frontend: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = './frontend/dist'; const dest = './backend/public'; if (fs.existsSync(src)) { if (!fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.mkdirSync(dest, { recursive: true }); fs.cpSync(src, dest, { recursive: true }); console.log('Frontend built and moved to backend/public'); }"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run move:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
